artist: Artist: Attributed to Fra Mattia (Marco Giovanni della Robbia); Artist: Formerly attributed to Andrea della Robbia
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: 'Madonna and Child with John the Baptist', ceramic, Italian cat. card dims D45', medium - terra cotta
text: We are grateful to the scholar Federica Carta for clarifying the attribution of this tondo.
title: Madonna and Child with St. John the Baptist in Tondo
